net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing

Interface LicenseProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeserializingLicenseProvider, FileLicenseProvider

    public interface LicenseProvider
    This specifies an interface for providing and persisting the stored, still-encrypted license content and signature object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nick Williams

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SignedLicense getLicense(Object context)
      Gets the stored, still-encrypted license content and signature from the persistence store.

    • Method Detail

      • getLicense

        SignedLicense getLicense(Object context)
        Gets the stored, still-encrypted license content and signature from the persistence store.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which to get the license
        Returns:
        the signed license object.
